                    boolean dependenciesFinished,
                    int developerAmount)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Makes a new delegated task
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID to be used for this task
        description - The description of the task
        estimatedDuration - The estimated duration for this task
        acceptableDeviation - The acceptable deviation for this task
        resourceTypes - The needed resource types for this task
        dependenciesFinished - The boolean indicating whether the dependencies are finished or not
        developerAmount - An integer indicating the amount of developers needed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] Throws an exception if one of the params are an illegal argument
